memberdef.name: YY_LESS_LINENO
memberdef.initializer: do { \ int yyl;\ for ( yyl = n; yyl < yyleng; ++yyl )\ if ( yytext[yyl] == '\n' )\ --yylineno;\ }while(0)

memberdef.name: yyless
memberdef.initializer: do \ { \ /* Undo effects of setting up yytext. */ \ int yyless_macro_arg = (n); \ YY_LESS_LINENO(yyless_macro_arg);\ *yy_cp = yyg->yy_hold_char; \ YY_RESTORE_YY_MORE_OFFSET \ yyg->yy_c_buf_p = yy_cp = yy_bp + yyless_macro_arg - YY_MORE_ADJ; \ YY_DO_BEFORE_ACTION; /* set up yytext again */ \ } \ while ( 0 )

memberdef.name: yy_set_bol
memberdef.initializer: { \ if ( ! YY_CURRENT_BUFFER ){\ libconfig_yyensure_buffer_stack (yyscanner); \ YY_CURRENT_BUFFER_LVALUE = \ libconfig_yy_create_buffer(yyin,YY_BUF_SIZE ,yyscanner); \ } \ YY_CURRENT_BUFFER_LVALUE->yy_at_bol = at_bol; \ }

memberdef.name: YY_DO_BEFORE_ACTION
memberdef.initializer: yyg->yytext_ptr = yy_bp; \ yyleng = (size_t) (yy_cp - yy_bp); \ yyg->yy_hold_char = *yy_cp; \ *yy_cp = '\0'; \ yyg->yy_c_buf_p = yy_cp;

memberdef.name: ECHO
memberdef.initializer: do { if (fwrite( yytext, yyleng, 1, yyout )) {} } while (0)

memberdef.name: YY_INPUT
memberdef.initializer: if ( YY_CURRENT_BUFFER_LVALUE->yy_is_interactive ) \ { \ int c = '*'; \ size_t n; \ for ( n = 0; n < max_size && \ (c = getc( yyin )) != EOF && c != '\n'; ++n ) \ buf[n] = (char) c; \ if ( c == '\n' ) \ buf[n++] = (char) c; \ if ( c == EOF && ferror( yyin ) ) \ YY_FATAL_ERROR( "input in flex scanner failed" ); \ result = n; \ } \ else \ { \ errno=0; \ while ( (result = fread(buf, 1, max_size, yyin))==0 && ferror(yyin)) \ { \ if( errno != EINTR) \ { \ YY_FATAL_ERROR( "input in flex scanner failed" ); \ break; \ } \ errno=0; \ clearerr(yyin); \ } \ }\ \

memberdef.name: yyless
memberdef.initializer: do \ { \ /* Undo effects of setting up yytext. */ \ int yyless_macro_arg = (n); \ YY_LESS_LINENO(yyless_macro_arg);\ yytext[yyleng] = yyg->yy_hold_char; \ yyg->yy_c_buf_p = yytext + yyless_macro_arg; \ yyg->yy_hold_char = *yyg->yy_c_buf_p; \ *yyg->yy_c_buf_p = '\0'; \ yyleng = yyless_macro_arg; \ } \ while ( 0 )

detaileddescription.para:
Discard all buffered characters. On the next scan, YY_INPUT will be called.
b
the buffer state to be flushed, usually YY_CURRENT_BUFFER.
yyscanner
The scanner object.

Pushes the new state onto the stack. The new state becomes the current state. This function will allocate the stack if necessary.
new_buffer
The new state.
yyscanner
The scanner object.

Removes and deletes the top of the stack, if present. The next element becomes the new top.
yyscanner
The scanner object.
The main scanner function which does all the work.

Setup the input buffer state to scan directly from a user-specified character buffer.
base
the character buffer
size
the size in bytes of the character buffer
yyscanner
The scanner object.
the newly allocated buffer state object.

Setup the input buffer state to scan a string. The next call to libconfig_yylex() will scan from a copy of str.
yystr
a NUL-terminated string to scan
yyscanner
The scanner object.
the newly allocated buffer state object.
If you want to scan bytes that may contain NUL values, then use libconfig_yy_scan_bytes() instead.

Setup the input buffer state to scan the given bytes. The next call to libconfig_yylex() will scan from a copy of bytes.
yybytes
the byte buffer to scan
_yybytes_len
the number of bytes in the buffer pointed to by bytes.
yyscanner
The scanner object.
the newly allocated buffer state object.

Get the user-defined data for this scanner.
yyscanner
The scanner object.

Set the user-defined data. This data is never touched by the scanner.
user_defined
The data to be associated with this scanner.
yyscanner
The scanner object.

Get the input stream.
yyscanner
The scanner object.

Set the input stream. This does not discard the current input buffer.
in_str
A readable stream.
yyscanner
The scanner object.
libconfig_yy_switch_to_buffer

Get the output stream.
yyscanner
The scanner object.

Get the length of the current token.
yyscanner
The scanner object.

Get the current token.
yyscanner
The scanner object.

Get the current line number.
yyscanner
The scanner object.

Set the current line number.
line_number
yyscanner
The scanner object.

Get the current column number.
yyscanner
The scanner object.

Set the current column.
line_number

The scanner object.
